definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]

sentences.english: The device used to weave together warp and weft threads is called a loom.
sentences.chinese: 用于编织在一起经纱和纬纱的设备被称为一台织布机。

sentences.english: Keeping the steady warp tension of loom is a key for a loom.
sentences.chinese: 保持织机经纱张力的恒定是织机的一项关键技术。

sentences.english: The weaving performance of yarn is generally expressed in terms of warp breakage rate in weaving.
sentences.chinese: 经纱可织性一般用织造时的经纱断头率来表示。

sentences.english: The weaving performance of yarn is generally expressed in terms of warp breakage rate in weaving.
sentences.chinese: 经纱可织性一般用织造时的经纱断头率来表示。

sentences.english: Single end strength coefficient of variability is the main reason of breakage end.
sentences.chinese: 指出单纱强力不匀是产生经纱断头的主要原因。

sentences.english: Warp-tying is another cost factor in the weaving mill.
sentences.chinese: 经纱接头是织造厂的另一个成本因素。

sentences.english: According to th mechanics of pliable thread, forces which are applied on warp sheets at shedding were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 本文应用柔线力学原理分析了开口时经纱的受力状态。

sentences.english: The shuttle passes over the lowered ends of the shed and under the raised ends.
sentences.chinese: 梭子是从梭口的上下两层经纱之间穿过。

sentences.english: Because of this, some friction will exist between the shuttle and the warp yarns near the selvages .
sentences.chinese: 因此在布边附近，梭子和经纱之间会存在摩擦。

sentences.english: In this paper, comparison of sizing technology between two kinds of sizing machines isdealt with by sizing high - count ends.
sentences.chinese: 将细号经纱在两种浆纱机上进行上浆工艺对比。

sentences.english: In this system, the warp yarns are fed to the loom.
sentences.chinese: 在该系统中，经纱被送入织机。

definition: doubling (combining two or more lengths of yarn into a single thread)
to wind/to coil/to spool/to loop around/winding
to spin synthetic fiber/to spin silk/spinning/filature
lines of latitude and longitude/warp and woof
